movies.title: Baahubali
movies.description: Epic tale of two brothers vying for the throne of a kingdom.

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.description: A story about friendship, pursuing dreams, and the pressures of society.

movies.title: Visaaranai
movies.description: Four migrant workers are brutalized by police after being wrongly accused of a crime.

movies.title: Dangal
movies.description: A father's determination to make his daughters world-class wrestlers.

movies.title: Piku
movies.description: A quirky comedy about a daughter's relationship with her aging father.

movies.title: Super Deluxe
movies.description: Four interconnected stories explore moral dilemmas and redemption.

movies.title: Kabir Singh
movies.description: A passionate love story marred by personal demons.

movies.title: Vikram Vedha
movies.description: A cat-and-mouse game between a ruthless gangster and an honest cop.

movies.title: Asuran
movies.description: A man from an oppressed caste seeks revenge against a powerful landlord.
movies.review: Intense and powerful portrayal of caste-based discrimination.

movies.description: A reunion of childhood sweethearts after 22 years sparks nostalgia and emotions.
movies.review: Heartwarming and nostalgic journey of love.

movies.title: Thalapathi
movies.description: A powerful gangster drama about friendship and loyalty.

movies.title: Mahanati
movies.description: Biographical drama based on the life of actress Savitri.

movies.title: Enthiran
movies.description: A scientist creates a humanoid robot with unforeseen consequences.
movies.review: Groundbreaking visual effects and thought-provoking themes.

movies.title: Andhadhun
movies.description: A blind pianist unwittingly becomes embroiled in murder.

movies.title: Drishyam
movies.description: A man takes desperate measures to protect his family when they become embroiled in a crime.

movies.title: Jersey
movies.description: A failed cricketer decides to revive his career for the sake of his son.

movies.title: Bhaag Milkha
movies.description: Biographical sports drama based on the life of Milkha Singh.

movies.title: Lucia
movies.description: A man's dreams and reality blur after he starts using a special pill.

movies.title: KGF Chapter 1
movies.description: A man rises from rags to riches in the world of gold mining.

movies.title: Aruvi
movies.description: A young woman's journey from innocence to activism.

movies.title: The Shawshank
movies.description: A banker wrongfully convicted of murder escapes from prison after 25 years and befriends a fellow prisoner.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
movies.review: Provocative exploration of identity and rebellion.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A young woman from an aristocratic family falls in love with a poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S Titanic.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: Oskar Schindler uses his influence to save hundreds of Polish Jewish refugees during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.
movies.review: Powerful and harrowing depiction of World War II.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical challenges of his criminal career as he attempts to combat this corrupt entity.
movies.review: Dark and gritty superhero film with a profound impact.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Johnwick
movies.description: Story of gangster who returned from ganster life
